mapper.select: SELECT NAME, PASSWORD, BIRTH_YEAR, SEX, ADDR, ADDR_DETAIL, SIMPLE_INTRODUCE_MYSELF, DETAIL_INTRODUCE_MYSELF, IMAGE, EMAIL, GIT_HUB, BLOG, REGIST_TS, UPDATE_TS FROM MY_PROFILE WHERE NAME = #{name}

SELECT STACK_SEQ, NAME, STACK_NAME, STACK_LEVEL, STACK_DETAIL, STACK_IMAGE, CATEGORY, CATEGORY_LEVEL, PROFILE_VIEW_YN, REGIST_TS, UPDATE_TS FROM MY_STACK WHERE NAME = #{name} ORDER BY CATEGORY_LEVEL, STACK_LEVEL
